item.title: Dual Cone Gradient Descent for Training Physics-Informed Neural Networks
item.description: Dual Cone Gradient Descent (DCGD) enhances Physics-Informed Neural Network (PINN) training by resolving gradient imbalance issues, leading to more accurate and stable solutions for complex partial dif…
